content.raw:
Created `/home/developer/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models/3d_lidar/mesh/` and made a symbolic link `ln -s /home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models/3d_lidar/mesh/3d_lidar.dae /home/developer/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models/3d_lidar/mesh/3d_lidar.dae` for all. Resulted in errors going away and WAM-V visuals coming back.

Proper solution: PR to gazebo to not use absolute path

For now: Change `developer` to `$USER`, which for me is `tylerlum`, which should fix it.

Resulted in errors going away and WAM-V visuals coming back.

Proper solution: PR to gazebo to not use absolute path

For now: Change developer to $USER, which for me is tylerlum, which should fix it.
